homepage.title: How to participate?
homapage.instructions: Please click the button beow to make a donation to Room to Read before registering for the Challenege. We ask that you donate the equivalent of USD($)5, or whatever you can spare or care to donate in your local currency. Through our Corporate Matching Program, the firm will also contribute to the money raised.
